title: Empire.io
author: Empire.io
content: Howdy, BitcoinTalk gaming enthusiasts! The weekend's horizon beckons!Ride into the Wild West with "Wanted Dead or a Wild". Stake 100 USDT on Friday, Saturday, or Sunday and get set for a thrilling 30 free spins each day of adventure. Rack up to a whopping 90 free spins to be credited this upcoming Monday! Get ready to lasso in an exhilarating start to your week!How to Join the Rodeo:Register/Login at www.Empire.io.Mosey on over to the video slots corral.Lock and load in "Wanted Dead or a Wild", ensuring your wagers round up to at least 100 USDT across the promo days.Await your bounty – up to 90 free spins, based on your days in the saddle, to drop by Monday 18:00 GMT.T&Cs:Promo Window: From 13/10 (Friday) 0:00 to 15/10 (Sunday) 23:59 GMT.Game in Spotlight: Only stakes on "Wanted Dead or a Wild" ride towards this offer.Reward Time: Free spins will gallop into your account by the following Monday, 18:00 GMT.Wagering Rule: Loot from Free Spins needs to be wagered 10x within a fortnight.House Rules: Empire.io's regular terms and conditions are in play.For the full trail map of Empire.io, mosey over to: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5464593.0Don't let this wild offer slip through – seize the spirit of the Wild West while the sun's still high! See y'all at the slots!
